com.picocontainer.injectors

Class ConstructorInjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.picocontainer.injectors.AbstractInjectionType
      • com.picocontainer.injectors.ConstructorInjection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentFactory, InjectionType, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForgetfulConstructorInjection, Jsr330ConstructorInjection

    public class ConstructorInjection
extends AbstractInjectionType
    A InjectionType for constructor injection. The factory creates ConstructorInjection.ConstructorInjector. If there is more than one constructor for the component, the one with the most satisfiable parameters will be used. By default, the choice of constructor for the component in question will be remembered between usages.
    Author:
    Paul Hammant, Jon Tirsén
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createComponentAdapter

        public <T> ComponentAdapter<T> createComponentAdapter(ComponentMonitor monitor,
                                             LifecycleStrategy lifecycle,
                                             Properties properties,
                                             Object key,
                                             Class<T> impl,
                                             ConstructorParameters constructorParams,
                                             FieldParameters[] fieldParams,
                                             MethodParameters[] methodParams)
                                           throws PicoCompositionException
        Description copied from interface: ComponentFactory
        Create a new component adapter based on the specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        monitor - the component monitor
        lifecycle - te lifecycle strategy
        properties - the component properties
        key - the key to be associated with this adapter. This value should be returned from a call to ComponentAdapter.getComponentKey() on the created adapter.
        impl - the implementation class to be associated with this adapter. This value should be returned from a call to ComponentAdapter.getComponentImplementation() on the created adapter. Should not be null.
        constructorParams - TODO
        fieldParams - TODO
        methodParams - TODO
        Returns:
        a new component adapter based on the specified arguments. Should not return null.
        Throws:
        PicoCompositionException - if the creation of the component adapter results in a PicoCompositionException.
